summary.span: 派生自 类的对象的可变集合。

summary.span: 该类设计用于包含 Principal 的多值属性。

span.span: This class is designed to be used for multi-valued properties that contain Principals.

summary.span: 对该集合中的内容进行操作将更改相应的存储属性的内容，当在对应的主体对象上调用 时该存储属性的内容将变成永久性的。

span.span: Manipulating the contents of this collection changes the contents of the corresponding store property, which is made permanent when is called on the corresponding principal object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从概念上讲，每个实例具有与之关联的单个枚举器。Conceptually, each instance of has a single enumerator associated with it. 尽管多次调用返回非重复对象，它们共享相同的内部状态。Although multiple calls to return distinct objects, they share the same internal state.
